data.title: An Unusual Angle by Greg Egan: Near Fine Soft cover (1983) 1st Edition
data.meta_description: 1st Edition - Soft cover - Norstrilia Press - Australia - 1983 - Condition: Near Fine - Author's first book. Very scarce. Near fine. - An Unusual Angle
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

Orders paid by personal check may be held two weeks to allow the check to clear. AVAILABILITY/

CONDITION/EDITION INQUIRIES: If you have questions concerning specific books not addressed by the

Book Description, order the book, and in the Special Instructions section during checkout, specify your

exact conditions concerning the condition, edition, or other aspects of the book. If the book fits your

requirements, we'll ship it -- if not, we won't. Thanks!

Greg Ketter

DreamHaven Inc. 2301 E. 38th S...

More Information

Shipping Terms:

Orders ship within 5 business days. We ship all orders carefully packed. U.S. orders insured automatically. International customers: if you want your shipment insured, please say so in the Special Instruction section during checkout, and we will use Priority Mail International (please note this is much more expensive than our quoted shipping rates). Shipping rates are based on books weighing 2.2 LB (1KG) and under $100 in value. Additional charges may apply for oversize, heavy, or more expensive books.
